title: High mountain venture
creator_credit: Ross Matthews, Ross Campbell and Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre
brief_description: Shows the activities offered to boys at the Education Department’s school camp at Bogong, Victoria. A balanced program of conservation studies and challenging physical activities is the highlight of this very popular camp. Suitable for tertiary level.
